name: Intertwined (PenGame)
description:
Objective:

The main objective in Intertwined is to repair the communication between two houses on a floating island. How do you achieve this? The answer is quite simple, You are able to rotate the floating island in order to move a ball of twine from one house to the other. but watch out you have a limited amount of twine!

Intertwined was developed for the Global Game Jam 2020
The game was originally developed for the Global Game Jam 2020, but we decided to continue development for this project. For updates follow our Twitter: @PenGame_Studio

Created by Pengame:
